languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт выпрямляется во весь свой рост.{/n} "Отправиться с тобой?" {n}Эльдарка чуть кривит губы, размышляя о чем-то.{/n} "Возможно... возможно, так я смогу отыскать следы своих братьев, переживших разрушение нашего мира... или даже узнать, что стало причиной его гибели..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт выпрямляется во весь свой рост.{/n} "Отправиться с тобой?" {n}Эльдарка чуть кривит губы, размышляя о чем-то.{/n} "Возможно... возможно, так я смогу отыскать следы своих братьев, переживших разрушение нашего мира... или даже узнать, что стало причиной его гибели..."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet straightens up to her full height.{/n} "Go with you?" {n}She purses her lips, considering something.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps that way I could search for traces of my kin who survived the destruction of our world... or even find out the cause of their deaths..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт выпрямляется во весь свой рост.{/n} "Отправиться с тобой?" {n}Эльдарка чуть кривит губы, размышляя о чем-то.{/n} "Возможно... возможно, так я смогу отыскать следы своих братьев, переживших разрушение нашего мира... или даже узнать, что стало причиной его гибели..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet straightens up to her full height.{/n} "Go with you?" {n}She purses her lips, considering something.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps that way I could search for traces of my brethren who survived the destruction of our world... or even find out the cause of their deaths..."

{n}Yrliet straightens up to her full height.{/n} "Go with you?" {n}She purses her lips, considering something.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps that way I could search for traces of my brethren who survived the destruction of our world... or even find out the cause of their deaths..."

{n}Yrliet straightens up to her full height.{/n} "Go with you?" {n}She purses her lips, considering something.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps that way I could search for traces of my brethren who survived the destruction of our world... or even find out the cause of their deaths..."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特挺直了身子。{/n}“和你一起走？”{n}她抿了抿嘴唇，思考着什么。{/n}“或许……或许这样一来，我就能找到我们的世界覆灭之后，幸存下来的族人都在什么地方……甚至可能会发现他们的死因……”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet straightens up to her full height.{/n} "Go with you?" {n}She purses her lips, considering something.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps that way I could search for traces of my kin who survived the destruction of our world... or even find out the cause of their deaths..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特挺直了身子。{/n}“和你一起走？”{n}她抿了抿嘴唇，思考着什么。{/n}“或许……或许这样一来，我就能找到我们的世界覆灭之后，幸存下来的兄弟姐妹都在什么地方……甚至可能会发现他们的死因……”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se endereza por completo.{/n} «¿Acompañarte?». {n}Aprieta los labios, sopesando sus opciones.{/n} «Tal vez... tal vez así pueda buscar el rastro de aquellos de mi gente que sobrevivieron a la destrucción de nuestro mundo... o incluso descubrir la causa de su muerte...».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet straightens up to her full height.{/n} "Go with you?" {n}She purses her lips, considering something.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps that way I could search for traces of my kin who survived the destruction of our world... or even find out the cause of their deaths..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se endereza por completo.{/n} «¿Acompañarte?». {n}Aprieta los labios, sopesando sus opciones.{/n} «Tal vez... tal vez así pueda buscar el rastro de mis hermanos que sobrevivieron a la destrucción de nuestro mundo... o incluso descubrir la causa de su muerte...».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは背筋をピンと目一杯伸ばす。{/n}「一緒に？」{n}口をきっと結んでユリエットは何かを考えている。{/n}「おそらく…おそらくだが、そうすれば私は、世界の崩壊から生き残った同胞の足跡を見つけられるかもしれない…あるいは、同胞が死んだ原因が分かるだけに終わるかもしれない…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet straightens up to her full height.{/n} "Go with you?" {n}She purses her lips, considering something.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps that way I could search for traces of my kin who survived the destruction of our world... or even find out the cause of their deaths..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは背筋をピンと目一杯伸ばす。{/n}「一緒に？」{n}口をきっと結んでユリエットは何かを考えている。{/n}「おそらく…おそらくだが、そうすれば私は、世界の崩壊から生き残った同胞の足跡を見つけられるかもしれない…あるいは、同胞が死んだ原因が分かるだけに終わるかもしれない…」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet richtet sich zu ihrer vollen Größe auf.{/n} "Mit Euch gehen?" {n}Sie schürzt nachdenklich die Lippen.{/n} "Vielleicht ... vielleicht könnte ich auf diesem Weg die Spur meiner Leute verfolgen, die die Zerstörung unserer Welt überlebt haben ... oder aber die Ursache ihres Todes herausfinden ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet straightens up to her full height.{/n} "Go with you?" {n}She purses her lips, considering something.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps that way I could search for traces of my kin who survived the destruction of our world... or even find out the cause of their deaths..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet richtet sich zu ihrer vollen Größe auf.{/n} "Mit Euch gehen?" {n}Sie schürzt nachdenklich die Lippen.{/n} "Vielleicht ... vielleicht könnte ich auf diesem Weg die Spur meiner Brüder verfolgen, die die Zerstörung unserer Welt überlebt haben ... oder aber die Ursache ihres Todes herausfinden ..."

languages.text: « Vous accompagner ? » {n}répète Yrliet en se dressant de toute sa hauteur, avant de prendre un instant pour réfléchir, les lèvres pincées.{/n} « Oui... Cela me permettrait peut-être de chercher des traces de mes semblables qui ont survécu à la destruction de notre monde... voire de découvrir ce qui l'a mené à sa perte... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet straightens up to her full height.{/n} "Go with you?" {n}She purses her lips, considering something.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps that way I could search for traces of my kin who survived the destruction of our world... or even find out the cause of their deaths..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous accompagner ? » {n}répète Yrliet en se dressant de toute sa hauteur, avant de prendre un instant pour réfléchir, les lèvres pincées.{/n} « Oui... Cela me permettrait peut-être de chercher des traces de mes frères et sœurs qui ont survécu à la destruction de notre monde... voire de découvrir ce qui l'a mené à sa perte... »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet olabildiğince dik duruyor.{/n} "Seninle gelmek mi?" {n}Dudaklarını büzüp değerlendiriyor.{/n} "Belki de bu şekilde dünyamızın yıkımından sağ çıkmış soydaşlarımın izini sürebilir... Sağ kalan yoksa bile ölümlerine neyin sebep olduğunu bulabilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet straightens up to her full height.{/n} "Go with you?" {n}She purses her lips, considering something.{/n} "Perhaps... perhaps that way I could search for traces of my kin who survived the destruction of our world... or even find out the cause of their deaths..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet olabildiğince dik duruyor.{/n} "Seninle gelmek mi?" {n}Dudaklarını büzüp değerlendiriyor.{/n} "Belki de bu şekilde dünyamızın yıkımından sağ çıkmış soydaşlarımın izini sürebilir... Sağ kalan yoksa bile ölümlerine neyin sebep olduğunu bulabilirim."
